= Brain Areas =

*Approach of defining areas*:
  * use established neurobiological names as base
  * make area names unique to avoid misunderstanding
  * ignore sensory nuclei and cortices, except for vision, audition and proprioception
  * use visual and auditory senses to track both unimodal and polymodal paths
  * do not create thalamus area to avoid mixing unrelated paths, assign thalamus nuclei to other areas
  * do not create limbic area to avoid mixing unrelated functions, assign limbic components to other areas
  * take into account all subcortical nuclei
  * all areas mapped by Brodmann placed in cortical category
  * cortical areas can include tightly related subcortical elements
  * consider only single left hemisphere, placing unique right hemisphere components into corresponding cuircuits

|| *HCA* || [BrainAreaHCA Hippocampus Area] || Creating Long Term Memory, Sensory Temporal Coding || long-term episodic memory ||
|| *FCA* || [BrainAreaFCA Frontal Cortex Area] || Sensory-Drive Associations || conscious behavior and emotions ||
|| <font color="red">Subcortical</font> || || || ||
|| *VBA* || [BrainAreaVBA Visual Basal Area] || Visual Subcortical Nuclei || major sensory system ||
|| *ABA* || [BrainAreaABA Auditory Basal Area] || Auditory Subcortical Nuclei || major sensory system ||
|| *BGA* || [BrainAreaBGA Basal Ganglia Area] || Conscious Action Control, Motor Temporal Coding || control of planned actions ||
|| *BFA* || [BrainAreaBFA Basal Feeling Area] || Drive Supply || Stimulus integration ||
|| <font color="red">Midbrain</font> || || || ||
|| *PFA* || [BrainAreaPFA Proprioception and Feedback Area] || Somatic and visceral sensations, control feedback || Pain and pleasure paths, body sensations ||
|| *TGA* || [BrainAreaTGA Tegmentum Area] || Somatic Motor and Sensory Control || pyramidal and extrapyramidal systems ||
|| *HTA* || [BrainAreaHTA Hypothalamus Area] || Visceral Motor Control || lifecycle control, cortex modulation ||
|| <font color="red">Spinal Cord</font> || || || ||
|| *SCA* || [BrainAreaSCA Spinal Cord Area] || Unimodal Motor Automation || reflexes ||
|| *PMA* || [BrainAreaPMA Primary Motor Area] || Motor Execution and Proprioception || effectors, first-order neurons ||

*Ignored areas*:
  * gustatory cortical area (BA 43)
  * piriform (olfactory) cortex (part of BA 27)
  * retrosubicular area (BA 48)
